code: export var setCurrentUser=function setCurrentUser(user){return{type:'SET_CURRENT_USER',payload:user};};export var updateUsersList=function updateUsersList(users){return{type:'UPDATE_USER_LIST',payload:users};};export var fetchUsersStart=function fetchUsersStart(){return{type:'FETCH_USERS_START'};};export var fetchUsersSuccess=function fetchUsersSuccess(users){return{type:'FETCH_USERS_SUCCESS',payload:users};};export var fetchUsersFailure=function fetchUsersFailure(errorMessage){return{type:'FETCH_USERS_FAILURE',payload:errorMessage};};
